title: Early train services ending on NEL due to maintenance works

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于维护工程，东北线（NEL）早期火车服务即将结束
title_translations.ms: Awal perkhidmatan kereta berakhir di NEL kerana kerja-kerja penyelenggaraan
title_translations.ta: பராமரிப்புப் பணிகளால் NEL இல் ஆரம்ப ரயில் சேவைகள் முடிவடைகின்றன

updates.text: Due to the early closure of the NEL stations between Punggol and Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront and NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 minutes while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates.

Due to the early closure of the NEL stations between Punggol and Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront and NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 minutes while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates.

With the early closure of the NEL stations between Punggol and Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront and NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 minutes while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE12 Serangoon and NE17 Punggol will end earlier at around 11pm this Fri and Sat - Jan 4 & 5. Pls note that Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Svc 325 will run until 12.50am.

With the early closure of the NEL stations between Punggol & Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront and NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 minutes while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE12 Serangoon and NE17 Punggol will end earlier at around 11pm this Fri and Sat - Jan 4 & 5. Pls note that Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Svc 325 will run until 12.50am.

With the early closure of the NEL stations between Punggol & Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront and NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 minutes while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE12 Serangoon and NE17 Punggol will end earlier at around 11pm this Fri and Sat - Jan 4 & 5. Pls note that Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Svc 325 will run until 12.50am.

With the early closure of NEL stations between Punggol & Serangoon, train svcs between NE1 HarbourFront & NE12 Serangoon will operate at a longer frequency of about 9 mins while svc hours on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT will be extended on the affected dates. https://t.co/Jp8x47WAPA

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE12 Serangoon & NE17 Punggol will end earlier at abt 11pm on Fri & Sat - Jan 4 &5 and 11 & 12, Feb 22 & 23 and Mar 1 & 2. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Svc 325 will run until 12.50am
